content:
Detailed Guidelines on DGFT & Foreign Trade Services

IEC (Import Export Code) Issuance, Modification, and Updation - 
New IEC registration via DGFT online portal.
Handling modification (change in address, directors/partners, PAN/GST linkage).
Annual updation as per DGFT requirement (mandatory even if no changes).
